data.client_settings: Desktop Canary, I don't know how to get the version number.
data.actual_result: Able to chat and upload images to channels, but Clyde sends a "Message cannot be delivered" message.
data.expected_result: Disable chat box, and remove the upload images option.
data.short_description: When in a channel that does not allow chatting or image uploads, you still have the option to do so.
data.steps_to_repro: - Chat in a channel that you don't have permissions to - Upload an image in a channel that you don't have permissions to
